onRequestReceived(com.google.android.gms.Description: Callback invoked when a new request is received. This allows an app to respond to the request as appropriate. If the app receives this callback, the system will not display a notification for this request.

Parameters: The ID of the request that was removed.
onRequestRemoved(java.lang.String).Description: Callback invoked when a previously received request has been removed from the local device. For example, this might occur if the sender cancels the request.

ClassDesc: Listener to invoke when a new request is received.
